name: crossmint-fullstack
description: Complete Crossmint integration for BlockDrive - embedded wallets, NFT collections, smart wallets, payment subscriptions, and Supabase integration. Multichain support from Day 1.
author: Sean Weiss/BlockDrive <sean@blockdrive.co>

embedded-wallets.name: Crossmint Embedded Wallets

smart-wallets.description: Implement Solana Smart Wallets with programmable security, multi-sig, and gas sponsorship

payment-subscriptions.name: Payment & Subscriptions

supabase-integration.name: Supabase Integration

crossmint-architect.name: Crossmint Architect

nft-specialist.name: NFT Specialist
nft-specialist.description: Specialist for NFT minting, collections, and membership token management

integration-specialist.name: Integration Specialist
